title: Process a Patient Refund
description: A patient has a credit balance on their account due to an overpayment. A refund check needs to be issued.

tasks.description: Identify a patient account with a credit balance from a work queue.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent finds an account that is due a refund.

tasks.description: Verify the reason for the credit balance and confirm no other outstanding balances exist for the patient.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent confirms the credit is valid and a refund is due.

tasks.description: Request a refund check to be issued to the patient for the credit amount.
tasks.expected_outcome: A request is sent to accounts payable to cut a check, and the patient's balance is zeroed out.
